tests.expectation: Multiple vals work and lists can be consistently blank if attr not required
tests.comment: Lists filled out as all multiple vals or all blanks per attr

tests.expectation: Single list val works with 'list like' rule
tests.comment: Lists filled out as single vals (without trailing commmas)

tests.expectation: Mixing blanks and regular list values works
tests.comment: Lists filled out as mixed multiple vals and blanks, i.e. only first 2 rows filled
